Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

BIPOC Author

Bingo Square [22]

Author must be Black, Indigenous or a Person of Color. HARD MODE: A book written by an Indigenous author. Check out this list of Indigenous SFF books to get you started.

Title Author Hard Mode
A Master of Djinn P. Djèlí Clark
A Snake Falls to Earth Darcie Little Badger
A Song Below Water Bethany C. Morrow
A Song of Wraiths and Ruin Roseanne A. Brown
Afterworld James G. Robertson
Amari and the Night Brothers B.B. Alston
An Unkindness of Ghosts Rivers Solomon
Beauty is a Wound Eka Kurniawan (CW for rape, torture, incest)
Binti Nnedi Okorafor
Black Leopard, Red Wolf Marlon James
Black Sun Rebecca Roanhorse
Black Water Sister Zen Cho
Broken Stars, edited Ken Liu
Children of Blood and Bone Tomi Adeyemi
City of Ash and Red Hye-Young Pyun
Conjure Women Afia Atakora
Cradle of Sea and Soil Bernie Anés Paz
Dark Constellations Pola Oloixarac
Elatsoe Darcie Little Badger
Empire of Wild Cherie Dimaline
Exit West Mohsin Hamad
Future Home of the Living God Louis Erdrich
Girl, Serpent, Thorn Melissa Bashardoust
Hadriana in All My Dreams René Depestre
I'm Waiting for You and Other Stories Kim Bo-Young
Imaro Charles Saunders
Invisible Planets, edited Ken Liu
Iron Widow Xiran Jay Zhao
Kindred Octavia E. Butler
Lightfinder Aaron Paquette
Like Water for Chocolate Laura Esquivel
Love After the End: An Anthology of Two-Spirit and Indigiqueer Speculative Fiction Joshua Whitehead
Love: Beyond Body, Space & Time Hope Nicholson, ed.
Mapping the Interior Stephen Graham Jones
Memoirs of a Polar Bear Yoko Tawada
Mongrels Stephen Graham Jones
Monstress Marjorie Liu
Moon of the Crusted Snow Waubgeshig Rice
Moon Witch, Spider King Marlon James
Mooncakes Suzanne Walker, Wendy Xu
Ninefox Gambit Yoon Ha Lee
Ophie’s Ghosts Justina Ireland
Parable of the Sower Octavia E. Butler
Pemmican Wars Katherena Vermette
Pet Akwaeke Emezi
Phoenix Extravagant Yoon Ha Lee
Record of a Night Too Brief Hiromi Kawakami
Riding the Trail of Tears Blake M. Hausman
Robopocalypse Daniel H. Wilson
She Who Became the Sun Shelley Parker-Chan
Son of a Trickster Eden Robinson
Sorrowland Rivers Solomon
Stigmata Phyllis Perry
Tail of the Blue Bird Nii Ayikwei Parkes
Take Us To Your Chief Drew Hayden Taylor
Tantalize Cynthia Leitich Smith
Tensorate Neon Yang
Terra Nullius Claire G. Coleman
The Ballad of Black Tom Victor LaValle
The Belles Dhonielle Clayton
The Bone Shard Daughter Andrea Stewart
The Changeling Victor LaValle
The Eldest Throne Bernie Anés Paz
The Factory Hiroko Oyamada
The Gilded Wolves Roshani Chokshi
The House of the Spirits Isabel Allende
The Jasmine Throne Tasha Suri
The Labyrinth's Archivist Day Al-Mohamed
The Marrow Thieves Cherie Dimaline
The Memory Police Yōko Ogawa
The Mermaid, the Witch, and the Sea Maggie Tokuda-Hall
The Only Good Indians Stephen Graham Jones
The Poppy War R.F. Kuang
The Queue Basma Abdel Aziz
The Ripper James G. Robertson
The Three-Body Problem Cixin Liu
The Tower Unbroken Michael Nwanolue
The Way Spring Arrives and Other Stories, edited Yu Chen
The Witch King H.E. Edgmon
The Wolf of Oren-Yaro K.S. Villoso
Trail of Lightning Rebecca Roanhorse
Under the Pendulum Sun Jeannette Ng
Walking the Clouds: An Anthology of Indigenous Science Fiction Grace Dillon, ed.
